verses.sanskrit:
हिरण्यवर्णां हरिणीं सुवर्णरजतस्रजाम्।
चन्द्रां हिरण्मयीं लक्ष्मीं जातवेदो म आवह॥
verses.transliteration:
hiraṇyavarṇāṃ hariṇīṃ suvarṇarajatasrajām।
candrāṃ hiraṇmayīṃ lakṣmīṃ jātavedo ma āvaha॥
verses.meaning: O Jataveda (Agni), invoke for me that Lakshmi who shines like gold, radiant and golden-hued, adorned with garlands of gold and silver, who is moon-like and embodiment of wealth.

verses.sanskrit:
तां म आवह जातवेदो लक्ष्मीमनपगामिनीम्।
यस्यां हिरण्यं विन्देयं गामश्वं पुरुषानहम्॥
verses.transliteration:
tāṃ ma āvaha jātavedo lakṣmīmanapagāminīm।
yasyāṃ hiraṇyaṃ vindeyaṃ gāmaśvaṃ puruṣānaham॥
verses.meaning: O Jataveda, bring to me that Lakshmi who never departs, blessed by whom I shall win wealth, cattle, horses and noble companions.

verses.sanskrit:
अश्वपूर्वां रथमध्यां हस्तिनादप्रबोधिनीम्।
श्रियं देवीमुपह्वये श्रीः मा देवी जुषताम्॥
verses.transliteration:
aśvapūrvāṃ rathamadhyāṃ hastinādaprabodhinīm।
śriyaṃ devīmupahvaye śrīḥ mā devī juṣatām॥
verses.meaning: I invoke the goddess Sri who is preceded by horses, who sits in the center of chariots, who is awakened by the trumpeting of elephants. May the divine Sri be pleased with me.

verses.sanskrit:
कां सोस्मितां हिरण्यप्राकारामार्द्रां ज्वलन्तीं तृप्तां तर्पयन्तीम्।
पद्मे स्थितां पद्मवर्णां तामिहोपह्वये श्रियम्॥
verses.transliteration:
kāṃ sosmitāṃ hiraṇyaprākārāmārdrāṃ jvalantīṃ tṛptāṃ tarpayantīm।
padme sthitāṃ padmavarṇāṃ tāmihopahvaye śriyam॥
verses.meaning: She who smiles gently, who has golden walls, who is moist with prosperity, blazing with splendor, fulfilled and fulfilling, who resides on the lotus with lotus-like complexion - I invoke that Sri here.

verses.sanskrit:
चन्द्रां प्रभासां यशसा ज्वलन्तीं श्रियं लोके देवजुष्टामुदाराम्।
तां पद्मिनीमीं शरणमहं प्रपद्येऽलक्ष्मीर्मे नश्यतां त्वां वृणे॥
verses.transliteration:
candrāṃ prabhāsāṃ yaśasā jvalantīṃ śriyaṃ loke devajuṣṭāmudārām।
tāṃ padminīmīṃ śaraṇamahaṃ prapadye'lakṣmīrme naśyatāṃ tvāṃ vṛṇe॥
verses.meaning: I take refuge in Her who is beautiful like the moon, who shines bright with renown, who is adored by the gods, who is highly magnanimous and abides in the lotus. May my misfortunes perish.

verses.sanskrit:
आदित्यवर्णे तपसोऽधिजातो वनस्पतिस्तव वृक्षोऽथ बिल्वः।
तस्य फलानि तपसा नुदन्तु मायान्तरायाश्च बाह्या अलक्ष्मीः॥
verses.transliteration:
ādityavarṇe tapaso'dhijāto vanaspatistava vṛkṣo'tha bilvaḥ।
tasya phalāni tapasā nudantu māyāntarāyāśca bāhyā alakṣmīḥ॥
verses.meaning: O Thou resplendent like the Sun, by Thy power plants like the bael tree have grown. May its fruits destroy through grace all inauspiciousness arising from inner organs and outer senses.

verses.sanskrit:
उपैतु मां देवसखः कीर्तिश्च मणिना सह।
प्रादुर्भूतोऽस्मि राष्ट्रेऽस्मिन् कीर्तिमृद्धिं ददातु मे॥
verses.transliteration:
upaitu māṃ devasakhaḥ kīrtiśca maṇinā saha।
prādurbhūto'smi rāṣṭre'smin kīrtimṛddhiṃ dadātu me॥
verses.meaning: May the companions of the Devas come to me along with glory and jewels. I am reborn in this realm of Sri, may it grant me inner glory and outer prosperity.

verses.sanskrit:
क्षुत्पिपासामलां ज्येष्ठामलक्ष्मीं नाशयाम्यहम्।
अभूतिमसमृद्धिं च सर्वां निर्णुद मे गृहात्॥
verses.transliteration:
kṣutpipāsāmalāṃ jyeṣṭhāmalakṣmīṃ nāśayāmyaham।
abhūtimasamṛddhiṃ ca sarvāṃ nirṇuda me gṛhāt॥
verses.meaning: I destroy the elder sister of Lakshmi, the embodiment of inauspiciousness, hunger and thirst. O Lakshmi, drive out from my abode all misfortunes and poverty.

verses.sanskrit:
गन्धद्वारां दुराधर्षां नित्यपुष्टां करीषिणीम्।
ईश्वरीं सर्वभूतानां तामिहोपह्वये श्रियम्॥
verses.transliteration:
gandhadvārāṃ durādharṣāṃ nityapuṣṭāṃ karīṣiṇīm।
īśvarīṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tāmihopahvaye śriyam॥
verses.meaning: I invoke Sri who is the gateway to all fragrance, who is invincible, who is eternally nourishing, who is the source of fertility, and who is the sovereign of all beings.

verses.sanskrit:
मनसः कामामाकूतिं वाचः सत्यमशीमहि।
पशूनां रूपमन्नस्य मयि श्रीः श्रयतां यशः॥
verses.transliteration:
manasaḥ kāmāmākūtiṃ vācaḥ satyamaśīmahi।
paśūnāṃ rūpamannasya mayi śrīḥ śrayatāṃ yaśaḥ॥
verses.meaning: May my heart's true yearnings be fulfilled and my speech reach truth. May cattle, beauty, food and the glory of Sri dwell in me as prosperity.

verses.sanskrit:
कर्दमेन प्रजा भूता मयि सम्भव कर्दम।
श्रियं वासय मे कुले मातरं पद्ममालिनीम्॥
verses.transliteration:
kardamena prajā bhūtā mayi sambhava kardama।
śriyaṃ vāsaya me kule mātaraṃ padmamālinīm॥
verses.meaning: Born through Kardama, O Kardama come to me. Make the Divine Mother adorned with lotus garlands dwell in my family.

verses.sanskrit:
आपः सृजन्तु स्निग्धानि चिक्लीत वस मे गृहे।
नि च देवीं मातरं श्रियं वासय मे कुले॥
verses.transliteration:
āpaḥ sṛjantu snigdhāni ciklīta vasa me gṛhe।
ni ca devīṃ mātaraṃ śriyaṃ vāsaya me kule॥
verses.meaning: May the waters create prosperity and abundance in my home. Make the Divine Mother Sri dwell in my family.

verses.sanskrit:
आर्द्रां पुष्करिणीं पुष्टिं पिङ्गलां पद्ममालिनीम्।
चन्द्रां हिरण्मयीं लक्ष्मीं जातवेदो म आवह॥
verses.transliteration:
ārdrāṃ puṣkariṇīṃ puṣṭiṃ piṅgalāṃ padmamālinīm।
candrāṃ hiraṇmayīṃ lakṣmīṃ jātavedo ma āvaha॥
verses.meaning: O Jataveda, invoke for me that Lakshmi who is moist with grace, who dwells in lotus ponds, who bestows nourishment, who is golden-hued, garlanded with lotuses, moon-like and the embodiment of wealth.

verses.sanskrit:
आर्द्रां यः करिणीं यष्टिं सुवर्णां हेममालिनीम्।
सूर्यां हिरण्मयीं लक्ष्मीं जातवेदो म आवह॥
verses.transliteration:
ārdrāṃ yaḥ kariṇīṃ yaṣṭiṃ suvarṇāṃ hemamālinīm।
sūryāṃ hiraṇmayīṃ lakṣmīṃ jātavedo ma āvaha॥
verses.meaning: O Jataveda, invoke for me that Lakshmi who is moist with prosperity, who moves like an elephant, who is radiant like gold, adorned with golden garlands, brilliant like the sun.

verses.sanskrit:
तां म आवह जातवेदो लक्ष्मीमनपगामिनीम्।
यस्यां हिरण्यं प्रभूतं गावो दास्योऽश्वान् विन्देयं पुरुषानहम्॥
verses.transliteration:
tāṃ ma āvaha jātavedo lakṣmīmanapagāminīm।
yasyāṃ hiraṇyaṃ prabhūtaṃ gāvo dāsyo'śvān vindeyaṃ puruṣānaham॥
verses.meaning: O Jataveda, bring to me that unfailing Lakshmi, blessed by whom I shall win abundant gold, cattle, servants, horses and noble companions.

verses.sanskrit:
यः शुचिः प्रयतो भूत्वा जुहुयादाज्यमन्वहम्।
श्रियः पञ्चदशर्चं च श्रीकामः सततं जपेत्॥
verses.transliteration:
yaḥ śuciḥ prayato bhūtvā juhuyādājyamanvaham।
śriyaḥ pañcadaśarcaṃ ca śrīkāmaḥ satataṃ japet॥
verses.meaning: He who is pure, disciplined, and offers ghee daily, and constantly chants these fifteen verses with desire for prosperity, will be blessed by Sri.

verses.sanskrit:
पद्मानने पद्म ऊरू पद्माक्षि पद्मसम्भवे।
त्वं मां भजस्व पद्माक्षि येन सौख्यं लभाम्यहम्॥
verses.transliteration:
padmānane padma ūrū padmākṣi padmasambhave।
tvaṃ māṃ bhajasva padmākṣi yena saukhyaṃ labhāmyaham॥
verses.meaning: O lotus-faced one, with lotus-like thighs and lotus eyes, born from the lotus - bless me O lotus-eyed one, so that I may attain happiness.

verses.sanskrit:
अश्वदायी गोदायी धनदायी महाधने।
धनं मे जुषतां देवि सर्वकामांश्च देहि मे॥
verses.transliteration:
aśvadāyī godāyī dhanadāyī mahādhane।
dhanaṃ me juṣatāṃ devi sarvakāmāṃśca dehi me॥
verses.meaning: O great treasure, giver of horses, cattle and wealth - O Devi, be pleased with my wealth and grant me the fulfillment of all desires.

verses.sanskrit:
पुत्रपौत्रधनं धान्यं हस्त्यश्वादिगवेरथम्।
प्रजानां भवसि माता आयुष्मन्तं करोतु माम्॥
verses.transliteration:
putrapautradhanaṃ dhānyaṃ hastyaśvādigaveratham।
prajānāṃ bhavasi mātā āyuṣmantaṃ karotu mām॥
verses.meaning: Sons, grandsons, wealth, grains, elephants, horses, cattle and chariots - You are the mother of all beings. Make me live long.

verses.sanskrit:
धनमग्निर्धनं वायुर्धनं सूर्यो धनं वसुः।
धनमिन्द्रो बृहस्पतिर्वरुणं धनमश्नुते॥
verses.transliteration:
dhanamagnidhanaṃ vāyurdhanaṃ sūryo dhanaṃ vasuḥ।
dhanamaindro bṛhaspatirvaruṇaṃ dhanamaśnute॥
verses.meaning: Wealth is Agni, wealth is Vayu, wealth is Surya, wealth is Vasu. Wealth is Indra, Brihaspati and Varuna.

verses.sanskrit:
वैनतेय सोमं पिब सोमं पिबतु वृत्रहा।
सोमं धनस्य सोमिनो महयं ददातु सोमिनः॥
verses.transliteration:
vainateya somaṃ piba somaṃ pibatu vṛtrahā।
somaṃ dhanasya somino mahayaṃ dadātu sominaḥ॥
verses.meaning: O Garuda (Vainateya), drink the soma. May Indra (Vritrahaan) drink soma. May the lord of wealth who possesses soma grant me abundance.

verses.sanskrit:
न क्रोधो न च मात्सर्यं न लोभो नाशुभा मतिः।
भवन्ति कृतपुण्यानां भक्तानां श्रीसूक्तं जपेत् सदा॥
verses.transliteration:
na krodho na ca mātsaryaṃ na lobho nāśubhā matiḥ।
bhavanti kṛtapuṇyānāṃ bhaktānāṃ śrīsūktaṃ japet sadā॥
verses.meaning: No anger, no jealousy, no greed, no inauspicious thoughts arise in those virtuous devotees who constantly chant the Sri Suktam.

verses.sanskrit:
वर्षन्तु ते विभावरि दिवो अभ्रस्य विद्युतः।
रोहन्तु सर्वबीजान्यव ब्रह्म द्विषो जहि॥
verses.transliteration:
varṣantu te vibhāvari divo abhrasya vidyutaḥ।
rohantu sarvabījānyava brahma dviṣo jahi॥
verses.meaning: May the lightning from the clouds of heaven shower down upon you. May all seeds sprout and grow. Destroy those who hate the Vedas.

verses.sanskrit:
पद्मप्रिये पद्मिनि पद्महस्ते पद्मालये पद्मदलायताक्षि।
विश्वप्रिये विष्णु मनोऽनुकूले त्वत्पादपद्मं मयि सन्निधत्स्व॥
verses.transliteration:
padmapriye padmini padmahaste padmālaye padmadalāyatākṣi।
viśvapriye viṣṇu mano'nukūle tvatpādapadmaṃ mayi sannidhatsva॥
verses.meaning: O lover of lotus, O lotus-dweller, lotus-handed one, with eyes like lotus petals, beloved of the universe, pleasing to Vishnu's mind - place your lotus feet upon me.

verses.sanskrit:
या सा पद्मासनस्था विपुलकटितटी पद्मपत्रायताक्षी।
गम्भीरावर्तनाभिः स्तनभरनमिता शुभ्रवस्त्रोत्तरीया॥
verses.transliteration:
yā sā padmāsanasthā vipulakaṭitaṭī padmapatrāyatākṣī।
gambhīrāvartanābhiḥ stanabharanamitā śubhravastrottarīyā॥
verses.meaning: She who sits on the lotus, with wide hips, eyes like lotus petals, deep navel, bowing with the weight of her bosom, clad in white garments.

verses.sanskrit:
लक्ष्मीर्दिव्यैर्गजेन्द्रैर्मणिगणखचितैः स्नापिता हेमकुम्भैः।
नित्यं सा पद्महस्ता मम वसतु गृहे सर्वमाङ्गल्ययुक्ता॥
verses.transliteration:
lakṣmīrdivyairgajendrairmaṇigaṇakhacitaiḥ snāpitā hemakumbhaiḥ।
nityaṃ sā padmahastā mama vasatu gṛhe sarvamāṅgalyayuktā॥
verses.meaning: Lakshmi bathed by divine elephants with golden pots studded with gems, eternally lotus-handed, endowed with all auspiciousness - may she dwell in my home.

verses.sanskrit:
लक्ष्मीं क्षीरसमुद्र राजतनयां श्रीरङ्गधामेश्वरीम्।
दासीभूतसमस्तदेववनितां लोकैकदीपाङ्कुराम्॥
verses.transliteration:
lakṣmīṃ kṣīrasamudra rājatanayāṃ śrīraṅgadhāmeśvarīm।
dāsībhūtasamastadevavanit āṃ lokaikadīpāṅkurām॥
verses.meaning: Lakshmi, daughter of the ocean of milk, sovereign of Srirangam, served by all divine ladies, the lamp that illuminates all worlds.
